attributes.action: clear all UK residential mortgages by upto £150K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rather than use funds to shore up banks, why not use the money to clear down mortgages upto the value of £150k per household.
The banks still get their cash, they reduce their loan book at the same time, thus reducing their own borrowings and exposure.
Meanwhile, the great british public have a resurgence of confidence, elimination of negative equity and start spending again - thus creating demand and jobs.
If there is a shortfall, the government could collect this by revaluing VAT or other measure.
